name: CodeTheAI
description:
Notice: This game was made in 3days so, it might have some bugs.

you are stuck in a spaceship, you have to find code data and use them to control the Ai companion to escape the spaceship.

Some of your background music was glitchy?

Fiverr making games for you = https://www.fiverr.com/nooob9/make-you-a-2d-pixel-game-for-you

 Don't worry, that is because your computer video card is low or your game is lagging. make sure to comment if you find any bugs, we tried our best to fix all the bugs :)

Enjoy!
